Header: Kandy 'Poppy Day' Remembers World War Heroes & Others
Content: Kandy Ex-servicemenâ€™s Association on Sunday (10) had its own 'Poppy Day' commemoration at the George de Silva Park in the heart of Kandy. Governor for Central Province, Upali Thennakoon, attended the event as the Chief Guest in order to commemorate the memory of World War heroes and others who laid their lives for the country, where killed in action, missing in action and wounded in action troops remembered. Several Senior Tri-Service officers, officers other ranks and family members of fallen ones attended the event.
